name: OUT_MED_ADHERE_INFO_HX
description: This table stores historical medication fill information for the patient. Each row represents a medication.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: OUTCOME_KEY_MED_ADH_HX
columns.description: The unique outcome key that links medication data to the rest of the outcome data.

columns.name: OUTCOME_MED_NAME_HX
columns.description: The medication name relevant to an adherence measure.

columns.name: OUTCOME_MED_HX_NDC_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: OUTCOME_MED_FIRST_FILL_HX_DATE
columns.description: The date this medication was first filled.

columns.name: OUTCOME_MED_LAST_FILL_HX_DATE
columns.description: The most recent fill date for the medication.

columns.name: OUTCOME_MED_NEXT_FILL_HX_DATE
columns.description: The expected next fill date for the medication.
